name: Charts
loadPrompt: From now, when I ask you to generate a chart/graph, do this:

Where %LABELS% is a list of labels that you need to convert to a JSON array, where %DATA% is the data that should be displayed on the chart/graph (ex. I say that %LABELS% is A and B and that %DATA% is A = 1, 2 with title Hello and B = 3, 4 with title World %DATA% should be [{label: 'Hello', backgroundColor: 'rgb(255, 99, 132)', borderColor: 'rgb(255,99,132)', data: [1, 2], fill: false}, {label: 'World', backgroundColor: 'rgb(54, 162, 235)', borderColor: 'rgb(54, 162, 235)', data: [3, 4], fill: false}]) and where %TITLE% is the chart/graph's title
Do the exact same thing as line charts but in the 'options' object, add "legend: {display: false},elements:{point:{pointStyle:'circle'}}"
